name: @davehong.co
tagline: project manager, ramen lover, BlackBerry enthusiast, Penn Stater
body:
As a project manager, I enable team success through motivation, and by coaching best practices and engineering processes to support, not hinder. I have delivered software solutions in a variety of roles; my background allows me to bridge the gap between business and technical teams with ease. I believe in using tools to reinforce good habits, so teams can focus on the cerebral. Talk to me about wikis, blogs, document repositories, or portals, and I'll buy you a latte. (Plus I can help implement them in your organization.) Follow me
